suppress.notes:
file name: jackson-databind-2.14.3.jar
See https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-35116 and https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972 . The Jackson team heartily refutes that this is a vulnerability, and we agree.
file name: commons-compress-1.24.0.jar This is brought in by Jena 4.10. It's a medium, and we don't want to interfere with Jena dependencies.
